# docker-label-inspector-validate

## docker-label-inspector-validate documentation

- Visit [Official Web Site](https://github.com/garethr/docker-label-inspector#readme){target=_blank}
- See [How to configure docker-label-inspector-validate rules](https://github.com/garethr/docker-label-inspector#linter){target=_blank}
- See [Index of problems detected by docker-label-inspector-validate](https://github.com/garethr/docker-label-inspector#linter){target=_blank}

[![docker-label-inspector - GitHub](https://gh-card.dev/repos/garethr/docker-label-inspector.svg?fullname=)](https://github.com/garethr/docker-label-inspector){target=_blank}

## Configuration in Mega-Linter

- Enable docker-label-inspector-validate by adding `DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE` in [ENABLE_LINTERS variable](/configuration/#activation-and-deactivation)
- Disable docker-label-inspector-validate by adding `DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE` in [DISABLE_LINTERS variable](/configuration/#activation-and-deactivation)

| Variable | Description | Default value |
| ----------------- | -------------- | -------------- |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS | User custom arguments to add in linter CLI call<br/>Ex: `-s --foo "bar"` |  |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter<br/>Ex: `(src|lib)` | Include every file |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter<br/>Ex: `(test|examples)` | Exclude no file |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_FILE_EXTENSIONS | Allowed file extensions. `"*"` matches any extension, `""` matches empty extension. Empty list excludes all files<br/>Ex: `[".py", ""]` | Exclude every file |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_FILE_NAMES_REGEX | File name regex filters. Regular expression list for filtering files by their base names using regex full match. Empty list includes all files<br/>Ex: `["Dockerfile(-.+)?", "Jenkinsfile"]` | `["Dockerfile"]` |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_FILE_NAME | docker-label-inspector-validate configuration file name</br>Use `LINTER_DEFAULT` to let the linter find it | `.docker-label-inspector-schema.json` |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_RULES_PATH | Path where to find linter configuration file | Workspace folder, then Mega-Linter default rules |
| DOCKERFILE_DLI_VALIDATE_DISABLE_ERRORS | Run linter but disable crash if errors found | `false` |

## Behind the scenes

### How are identified applicable files

- File names:
  - `Dockerfile`

<!-- markdownlint-disable -->
<!-- /* cSpell:disable */ -->

### Example calls

```shell
dli validate --dockerfile Dockerfile --schema .docker-label-inspector-schema.json
```


### Installation on mega-linter Docker image

- Dockerfile commands :
```dockerfile
RUN pip install -e "git+https://github.com/volkc/docker-label-inspector.git@master#egg=docker-label-inspector"
```
